You can change ads detecting threshold in settings \n 2. Some video downloaded corrupted in multi thread mode, use One thread for downloading in such situations \n\n For Video Downloading: \n \n 1. Press button,in dialog select resolution, if available, and press colored button \n \n 2, 3. Press Play on video player on page with video, after that video should be detected. \n \n If not try to press reload videos on video page or try reload page and repeat. \n If not email me.\n \n \n After downloading video available in app. \n Hi ;–) \n For video detecting go to video in browser, click play and waite until video detected(can take 5–50 seconds) \n 1. You can change ads detecting threshold in settings \n 2. Video Detection not working for some web sites in mobile mode, try use desktop version of web site if video not detecting in mobile mode \n If not try to press reload videos on video page or try reload page and repeat. \n If not email me.\n \n\n For Video Downloading: \n \n 1. Press Download button,in appeared screen select resolution, if available \n \n 2. Press press download button. \n \n \n After downloading video available in app. \n New Tab Cookies cleared Video Download Started Successfully!!! More tabs will be allowed in next updates Open in App Watch Video Ad Blocker Desktop Mode On Desktop Mode Off video resolution as in the player Open with… Video Found Show Video Download Dialog Don\'t show again What should we do? Preview Video Force Show video download button browser\'s icon Stop and Save Open download dialog or restart video check Video title edit menu home Power save mode detected!\nVideo detection not working, turn off power save mode! Warning! Power save Mode. download Check every request on MP4 video Check every request on M3U8 or MPD video Check web-sites urls Dark Mode Found videos from %1$s Title Ads Detection Treshold: Thread Count for regular files: Thread Count for HLS and MPD: Lock portrait screen orientation Regular Threads Count: M3U8 Threads Count: Downloads Location Downloads folder Hidden folder SD app folder Host Port User Password Save HTTP Proxy Only check web-sites urls if in supported list Bookmark Bookmarks Auto Theme Mode Check every request on audio GO Force Stream Download(for downloading regular(not m3u8 or mpd) live streams) Force Stream Detection(Detection urls with body content length -1, sometimes used for regular live streams) Postprocessing for all regular downloads Postprocessing for only live downloads Interrupt intrecepted media content for browser
